thread.title: Proud mommy Kareena agrees with Priyanka's compliment on son Taimur
thread.title_full: Proud mommy Kareena agrees with Priyanka's compliment on son Taimur

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE
title: Proud mommy Kareena agrees with Priyanka's compliment on son Taimur
text:
Kareena's reply to Priyanka is very adorable and goes on to show that Bebo is already beaming with pride. Mumbai: Kareena Kapoor Khan has finally replied to Priyanka Chopra’s compliment in a recent interview with a website.
A while back, ‘Quantico’ star had complimented Kareena’s son Taimur Ali Khan by saying, “It is such a wonderful moment and it is such a beautiful baby and he already has Kareena's pout. I am very excited for both Saif and Bebo. And the child is going to be a Prince and people need to focus on that."
Recently, Kareena Kapoor decided to reply to Priyanka’s heart-warming compliment. She said, “My son is the most gorgeous man this side of the equator. I take it as a compliment because yes his lips are amazing.”
Now, that’s really sweet of her. Seems like Bebo is already proud of her munchkin!
Kareena recently walked the ramp at the Lakme Fashion Week (LFW) as a showstopper for Anita Dongre on the final day of the gala event.
